meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Prudence Plunkett Zack Knowles Andy Baggarly Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6427.

td.p: Prudence Plunkett, a high school librarian from Wasilla, Alaska
Zack Knowles, a secretary from Baltimore, Maryland
Andy Baggarly, a journalist and author from Palo Alto, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $40,001)

tr.td: SPACE FIRSTS
THE RISE OF THE MOVIES
WHAT ARE YOU AFRAID OF?
DOUBLE-LETTER WORDS
BABY NAMES
ANAGRAMMED 21st CENTURY LEADERS
(Alex: And we will need both the first and the last name of the leader.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the Hubble telescope

Andy
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'On May 20, 1990 its first image, a star cluster in the constellation Carina, was received from space')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: On May 20, 1990 its first image, a star cluster in the constellation Carina, was received from space

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_3', 'clue_J_1_3_stuck', '(Zack: What is [pause, looks doubtful] mm-[*]??)
(Alex: Mm-[*] is a good guess.)
[Zack looks downward]
(Alex: It\'s correct.)
[Zack brightens, audience laughs with him]

Mars

Zack
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Andy
Zack
Prudence

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Prudence] Sorry, we cannot accept that.)
...
(Alex: [To Zack] No, it has to do with characters, not actors.)
...
(Alex: [To Andy] That\'s the character\'s name, portrayed by Michael Fox.)
PrudenceWho Alex from Family Ties
$3,200
ZackWho is Michael J. Fox
$10,200
AndyWho is Alex Keaton?
$9,801
Alex Keaton')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Creator Gary David Goldberg wrote this Republican character as unsympathetic, but the actor made him lovable')

tr.td: '80s SITCOM CHARACTERS
Creator Gary David Goldberg wrote this Republican character as unsympathetic, but the actor made him lovable
Andy
Zack
Prudence
3-day champion: $60,402
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Andy
Zack
Prudence

15 R
(including 2 DDs),
4 W

8 R,
2 W
(including 1 DD)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
